attributes.action: Pay a wage to those parents who choose to stay at home to raise their children and be recognised for doing a job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that mums and/or dad's who choose to stay at home to raise their child(ren) should have this recognised as a job and be paid a wage for it. Those who have been on Jobseekers Benefit since they left school should be given a job or their benefits stopped full stop.
